column5: Hey im wondering if anyone knows if theres any ice out on Marks or Leighs bay? Or how deep the ice is on some of the lakes on Ranger lake road or Whitman dam... or trout lake, ect ect ect?  Thanks if anyone knows! I figure I might aswell ask someone before I drive out at 5am on the weekend only to go back home.

hey fellow sooer! my buddys dad went up and fished vixen lake this past sunday and he said there was 3-4inches and caught 7 splake. theres a guy that lives on trout lake and hes been taking pictures of the ice progress and has been posting them on fishontario.com in the ice fishing section on the ice report. should be lots to walk out. im unsure of leighs bay, there should be lots of ice up the whitman dam road probably almost to sled on. i know i'll be going out this weekend for sure but unsure where! good luck!
ive heard leighs bay has a sold 4-5 inches on it. got to be carful out there tho!!
I've heard the same thing.  Nice to see all the people from the Soo here!!
I loved the Soo, but the work dried up in the early 80's and everybody with less than 15 years at Algoma got the boot.  Man the fishing around town was just wicked good, even then.
theres ice on the small lakes...you wont be disappointed if you get up for the 5am fish. splake are on fire right now.  As for me Ive got my eye on a rainbow lake this weekend.  Luck, and stay dry.
wooo a sault meeting here! i didnt think i'd ever see it on here!
wow susprising how many people from the soo are on here! should try to get some people togeather this winter for some fish!!
ooo ya a soo OFC community fish off!! im game!
